Hearing from the LORD requires us to listen to the sound of what we perceive is HIS voice. This can happen when we pray, listen to a sermon, or receive word from godly council. Let us be quick to hear and slow to speak according to the word.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   John 10:27
-   Week 2
    -   Psalms 85:8
-   Week 3
    -   Romans 10:17
-   Week 4
    -   Isaiah 30:21
-   Week 5
    -   2 John  1:6
